job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to refining and enhancing an AI system, which is a core aspect of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback
job_tasks.justification: Providing feedback on AI outputs is a crucial step in the model training and fine-tuning process.

job_tasks.phrase: participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions 'AI model fine-tuning,' which is a direct indicator of involvement in the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing AI tools and methodologies falls under the umbrella of exploring and developing new modeling approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating AI capabilities into a broader system to deliver a service, which is a software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes improving AI systems, participating in AI model fine-tuning, and integrating AI capabilities. While some tasks lean towards improving existing AI, the focus on fine-tuning and integrating AI with human expertise aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
